It's good at doing the types of things you're looking for - see some of the examples in the documentation.
You may have a look at Django's humanize module.
It is part of Django, but I think it would be quite easy to adapt it to your needs.

If you're going to use datetime, make sure you read this recent and most excellent article:
 Tips on using python's datetime module.
datetime will take care of most of the niceties of handling time arithmetic, but it won't give you the English-language pretty printing you're looking for.
